text: James or Jim Abbott may refer to: *James Abbott (Indian Army officer) (1807–1896), British colonial administrator *Jim Abbott (Canadian politician) (1942–2020), Canadian politician *James W. Abbott (born 1948), American university administrator and politician *Jim Abbott (born 1967), American baseball player *James Abbott (footballer) (1892–?), English footballer *James H. Abbott (1851–1914), British philatelist *James T. Abbott, American attorney and government official
title: James Abbott
